title: The yasuos today
body:
All the yasuo's i've seen today, what goes through yalls brain? i honestly want to know the thought process.

Like did they all just wake up and have a connectional agreement today that they will enforce the stereotype of "if you see a yas on your team, the other team wins"

It's stuff like this that makes people autoban the champ regardless if your teammate wants to play it or not.


Is this national yasuo int day? idk.
